HTML:
#Dreams

The long awaited single Kaleidoscope, co written and produced by North Vancouver-based JUNO award winner Ryan Stewart (Carly Rae Jepsen, Simple Plan, Owl City, is finally released along with a music video recorded and directed by local Vancouver filmmaker Brock Keller. The single showcases a more mature side of Corbin Hale after his first EP Chapter One that will continue to develop in his next singles. Check the music video out here and get it everywhere here !
